name: Military Minimalism
title: Least Military Investment
description: In 2023, Haiti allocated only 0.054% of its GDP to military expenditure, one of the lowest in the world. Additionally, only 0.02% of its labor force is involved in the armed forces as of 2020.

name: Salt Scarcity
title: Lowest Iodized Salt Consumption
description: As of 2017, only 7.5% of Haitian households consumed iodized salt, indicating a significant gap in nutritional intake compared to global standards.

name: Women Lead the Way
title: High Rate of Female-Headed Households
description: In 2017, 45.1% of households in Haiti were headed by women, showcasing a significant role of women in household leadership.
